      • init

        public void init()
          throws ALBPException
        Important function.
        Before calling this function, if you need to, you have to call setForceEIDSchema(ALBPEngineForceEIDSchema) and setIPNNodeForDTN2(int).
        This function have to be called once before using ALBPSocket.
        In case you will not call init() the ALBPSocket will do it for you.
        Throws:
        ALBPException - See @ALBPException

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Important function.
        You have to call this function when you don't want to use ALBPSockets anymore.
